name: Retro Space Shooter (itch) (ibrahim)
description:
Before play, press the blue fullscreen button  in the lower right corner. Because it has some resolution problems :(

You are a hero, and you have to save your planet from enemies. Let's save our planet!

  In the game, you have to complete 8 wave and boss fight to win the game. 

  I didn't explain the gameplay here, because the game has a gameplay panel. 

  Game Developer - @lxciian

  Assets (except UI elements) - @hiro(hamstone)

  Thank you so much to Hiro for these assets. 

  I hope you enjoyed from this game :)
